Very good video game shooter comparing with others, if you buy prime, you're gonna get 0 cheaters or maybe I should say less cheaters than the free version, you can also play it with your friends and have fun in casual mode, or you can play comp solo and with other friends and tryhard wining the game, just remember, ignore all Russain players and mute them, trust me, you're gonna thank me later
